{{Infobox quest |name = Vandham's Heir |image = Vandham's Heir.jpg |description = "Curious about the man who gave them the opportunity to choose a different life, the party decide to go and ask Monica about Guernica." |giver = |location = [[City]] |time = |prereqs = "Guernica Vandham" discussed |reclevel = Lv. 43 |rewards = 400 [[City]] [[Affinity (XC3)|Affinity]]
2840 [[Experience Points (XC3)|EXP]]
2880 [[Gold|G]]
10 [[Soul Tree|SP]]
[[Monica Vandham|Monica]] as a [[Hero]] }} '''Vandham's Heir''' is a [[Hero Quest]] in {{XC3}}, dedicated to [[Monica Vandham|Monica]]. == Objectives == # ''Talk with the specified character(s).'' #* [[Monica Vandham|Monica]] # ''Collect the specified thing(s).'' #* [[Zuo's Belongings]] #* [[Yew's Belongings]] #* [[Heewa's Belongings]] #** They are found in the [[Gura Flava Lowlands]] in [[Alfeto Valley]]. # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Remembrance Stones]] == Results == ''"The bereaved witnessed the off-seeing ceremony and thanked the party for everything they've done. Monica will lend you her help from now on."'' {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Hero Quests]] [[Category:XC3 Monica]] [[Category:City Quests]]

[[file:LapisVang.jpg|thumb|Lapis Vang in {{TTGC|-}}]] '''Vang''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ヴァンプ}}, ''Vanpu'', Vamp) are bat-like enemies found in the {{XC|serieslink}}. They are generally found at night or in caves.
There is no appearance change between games.
== {{XC|-}} == Vang are found around [[Colony 9 (XC1)|Colony 9]], in [[Tephra Cave]], on [[Bionis' Leg]], in the [[Ether Mine (XC1)|Ether Mine]], in [[Satorl Marsh]], in [[Makna Forest]], and on [[Valak Mountain]]. The strongest Vang is [[Musical Vanflare]], which is level 93 and resides in [[Tephra Cave]].
=== Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Air Vang]] * [[Brabilam Vang]] * [[Buio Vang]] * [[Drunk Vang]] * [[Gust Vang (XC1)|Gust Vang]] * [[Little Vang]] * [[Satorl Vang]] * [[Shadow Vang (XC1)|Shadow Vang]] * [[Sierra Vang]] * [[Storm Vang]] * [[Tempest Vang]] * [[Teneb Vang]] * [[Wind Vang]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Fierce Vang]] (during ''[[Earnest's Fibs]]'')
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Dark Kisling]] * [[Musical Vanflare]] * [[Shadeless Matrix]]
== {{XCFC|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Shadow Vang (XC1)|Shadow Vang]] * [[Wind Vang]]
=== Story Exclusive Enemy === * [[Wind Vang (story)|Wind Vang]] ([[Fogbeast]])
== {{XC2|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Amari Vang (XC2)|Amari Vang]] * [[Blood Vang]] * [[Bolc Vang]] * [[Fend Vang (XC2)|Fend Vang]] * [[Liar Vang (XC2)|Liar Vang]] * [[Noog Vang]] * [[Pipe Vang]] * [[Shreddle Vang (XC2)|Shreddle Vang]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Velites |image = XC3-Velites.png |caption = Velites |category = Minor Enemy |type = [[Levnis]] |level = 19 - ? |area = [[Caitlin Drum]]
[[Pentelas Region]]
[[Keves Castle]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Velites''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are [[Keves]]i [[Levnis]]es, and can be found at level 19 in [[Caitlin Drum]], level ? in [[Low Maktha Wildwood]] in the [[Pentelas Region]] and in [[Keves Castle]]. One accompanies [[Valdi]] alongside an [[Equites]] during his [[Hero Quest]]. {{clr}} == Stats == {{Enemy arts|art1=Iron Stamp}}{{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Pentelas Region Enemies]] [[Category:Keves Castle Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Levnises]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Story Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Vibrant Armring |image = XC3 Accessory Pack.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 10% when HP is at 90% or higher. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 3710 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Vibrant Armring |image = XC3 Accessory Pack.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 12% when HP is at 90% or higher. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 3710 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Vibrant Armring |image = XC3 Accessory Pack.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 15% when HP is at 90% or higher. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 3710 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Vibrant Armrings''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. Common ones can be bought at [[Gamma Commissary]] for 3710G. One of the options for ''[[Korresia Finds Her Calling]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Victor Gauntlet |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Deal 50% more damage but take 20% more damage. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 12,890 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Victor Gauntlet |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Deal 55% more damage but take 20% more damage. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 12,890 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Victor Gauntlet |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Deal 60% more damage but take 20% more damage. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 12,890 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Victor Gauntlets''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. When equipped, the character it is equipped to deals more damage, however they take more damage in return. They are dropped from [[Hornbow Dante]] Unique Monster, which is located in the [[Syra Hovering Reefs]] {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Vigorous Anklets |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Reduces damage taken by 20% while performing Art. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 13,600 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Vigorous Anklets |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Reduces damage taken by 22% while performing Art. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 13,600 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Vigorous Anklets |image = XC3 Accessory Boot.png |caption = Reduces damage taken by 25% while performing Art. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 13,600 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Vigorous Anklets''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Villainous Igna |image = XC3 Villainous Igna.png |caption = Villainous Igna |type = [[Igna]] |level = 46 |area = [[Elaice Highway]] ([[Igna Conglomerate]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = 1,231 |cp = 100 |sp = 5 |gold = 1,992 |hp = 1,198,800 |strength = 1,339 |healing = 347 |dexterity = 160 |agility = 158 |physdef = 25% |ethdef = 10% |critrate = 15% |guardrate-front = 20% |guardrate-side = 0% |guardrate-back = 0% }} '''Villainous Igna''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Igna]] family, and can be found at level 46 inside the [[Igna Conglomerate]] in [[Elaice Highway]]. The [[Dragon Gas]] [[Battle Arts (XC3)|Art]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 65% |knockback = 100% |blowdown = 100% |physdebuff = 50% |etherdebuff = 70% }} {{clr}} == Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Villainous Igna |image = |caption = Villainous Igna |type = [[Igna]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Enemy]] |level = 72 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Men! Of! The Sea! IV]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 286,200 |strength = 584 |healing = 406 |dexterity = 225 |agility = 226 |physdef = 25% |ethdef = 10% |critrate = 10% |guardrate-front = 15% |guardrate-side = 5% |guardrate-back = 0% }} Villainous Igna is fought at level 72 in the fourth wave of the ''[[Men! Of! The Sea! IV]]'' [[Challenge Battle Mode|challenge]]. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 50% |knockback = 75% |blowdown = 75% |physdebuff = 50% |etherdebuff = 50% }} {{clr}} == Gallery == <gallery> Villainous igna location.png Villainous igna.png </gallery>
